name: Happy Cat Care
overview1: A fully responsive pet service site developed with firebase authentication system to enhance security.
overview2: Dashboard Feature, with admin privilege to add & manage services
overview3: Customers can add review with rating and manage their own ordered services.
technology: React, Material UI, Firebase, Express, React Router

name: Impel Tourism
overview1: A mobile responsive Tourism Website with Firebase authentication for enhanced security system.
overview2: Users can add new tour destination by providing informations in a form created with react hook form.
overview3: All documents stored in MongoDB and data was fetched in backend by using express.
technology: React, Tailwind, Firebase, Express, React Router

name: Impel Health Care
overview1: A Health Care Related Site with Google, Github & Email sign in system for a better user experience.
overview2: Private/ Protected Route for a better security system.
overview3: Dynamic Route System and fully responsive website.
technology: React, Tailwind, Firebase React Router, React Hook

name: Impel Language Center
overview1: Firebase authentication system with Google, GitHub and Email sign in option for easy login.
overview2: Tailwind CSS was used to customize the design and make website look attractive
overview3: Protected route system and React Router v5 used to create single page application
